TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Clipboard extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供将数据置于系统剪贴板中以及从中检索数据的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to place data on and retrieve data from the system Clipboard.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关一系列预定义的格式以用于类，请参阅类。For a list of predefined formats to use with the class, see the class. 调用若要将数据放在剪贴板上，替换当前内容。Call to put data on the Clipboard, replacing its current contents. 若要将永久性数据的副本放到剪贴板上，设置`copy`参数`true`。To place a persistent copy of the data on the Clipboard, set the `copy` parameter to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 若要将数据放在多个格式在剪贴板上，使用类或实现。To place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats, use the class or an implementation. 将数据放在以多种格式剪贴板上，若要最大化，目标应用程序，您可能不知道，它的格式要求已成功检索数据的可能性。Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data. 调用从剪贴板检索数据。Call to retrieve data from the Clipboard. 作为实现的对象返回的数据接口。The data is returned as an object that implements the interface. 使用指定的方法和字段中若要从对象中提取数据。Use the methods specified by and fields in to extract the data from the object. 如果不知道您检索的数据的格式，则调用方法的接口，用于获取该数据的所有格式的列表存储在中。If you do not know the format of the data you retrieved, call the method of the interface to get a list of all formats that data is stored in. 然后调用方法的接口，并指定你的应用程序可以使用的格式。Then call the method of the interface, and specify a format that your application can use. 在中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，则类提供其他方法，可以更轻松地使用系统剪贴板。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with the system Clipboard. 调用方法从剪贴板中删除所有数据。Call the method to remove all data from the Clipboard. 若要将特定格式的数据添加到剪贴板，替换现有数据，调用适当`Set`*格式*方法，如，或调用方法，以指定格式。To add data of a particular format to the Clipboard, replacing the existing data, call the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as , or call the method to specify the format. 若要从剪贴板检索特定格式的数据，请先调用适当`Contains`*格式*方法 (如) 方法来确定剪贴板中是否包含中的数据的格式，然后再调用适当`Get`*格式*方法 (如) 来检索数据，如果剪贴板包含它。To retrieve data of a particular format from the Clipboard, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as ) method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format, and then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as ) to retrieve the data if the Clipboard contains it. 若要在这些操作中指定的格式，请调用和方法相反。To specify the format in these operations, call the and methods instead. > [!NOTE] > 所有基于 Windows 的应用程序共享系统剪贴板，因此可能会有所变动时切换到另一个应用程序。All Windows-based applications share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application. > > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放到剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果向剪贴板方法传递了非可序列化对象，该方法将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to a Clipboard method, the method will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅的序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. 如果目标应用程序需要非常特定的数据格式，标头添加到序列化过程中的数据可能会阻止应用程序识别你的数据。If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data. 若要保留您的数据格式，请添加你的数据作为到数组，并将传递到方法。To preserve your data format, add your data as a array to a and pass the to the method. > > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. > > 使用剪贴板使用图元文件格式时，可能需要特别注意的事项。Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard. 由于中的当前实现的限制使用较旧的图元文件格式的应用程序可能无法识别类，使用.NET Framework 的图元文件格式。Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format. 在这种情况下，您必须进行互操作与 Win32 剪贴板应用程序编程接口 (Api)。In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs). 有关详细信息，请参阅 323530，"图元文件上剪贴板是不可见对所有应用程序，"在 Microsoft 知识库文章在http://support.microsoft.com。For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用上放置数据和从系统剪贴板中检索它的方法。The following code example uses methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard. 此代码假定`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on the form. `button1_Click`方法调用从文本框中获取所选的文本并将其放在系统剪贴板上。The `button1_Click` method calls to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard. `button2_Click`方法调用从系统剪贴板中检索数据。The `button2_Click` method calls to retrieve data from the system Clipboard. 该代码使用并提取返回的数据，并显示中的数据`textBox2`。The code uses and to extract the data returned and displays the data in `textBox2`. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于多个进程都共享剪贴板，调用此方法可能会对这些进程的影响。Because the Clipboard is shared by multiple processes, calling this method may have an impact on those processes. > [!NOTE] > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此成员。The following example demonstrates this member. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含可以使用此方法使用的预定义的格式名称。The class contains pre-defined format names that you can use with this method. 使用此方法确定剪贴板中是否包含指定的格式或兼容的格式中的数据检索之前方法。Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此成员。The following example demonstrates this member. returns.span: 表示剪贴板数据的 ；如果剪贴板中包含的数据都不是指定 ，也无法转换为该格式，则为 。

span.span: An representing the Clipboard data or if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the specified or can be converted to that format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以确定剪贴板是否包含使用此方法进行检索之前指定的格式或兼容的格式中的数据。Use the method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with this method. 如果此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或存储数据时将设置为自动转换`false`，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. > > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. 使用方法将数据添加到剪贴板中的特定格式。Use the method to add data to the Clipboard in a particular format. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此成员。The following example demonstrates this member. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从剪贴板返回的对象的数据类型而异，因为此方法返回中的数据。Because the data type of the object returned from the Clipboard can vary, this method returns the data in an . 然后，可以使用的方法接口以提取其适当的数据类型中的数据。Then you can use methods of the interface to extract the data in its proper data type. 此方法尝试获取在 100 毫秒的时间间隔，十倍的数据，则引发如果所有尝试都均失败。This method attempts to get the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用上放置数据和从系统剪贴板中检索它的方法。The following code example uses methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard. 此代码假定`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been placed on the form. `button1_Click`方法调用从文本框中获取所选的文本并将其放在系统剪贴板上。The `button1_Click` method calls to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard. `button2_Click`方法调用从系统剪贴板中检索数据。The `button2_Click` method calls to retrieve data from the system Clipboard. 该代码使用和提取返回的数据。The code uses and to extract the data returned. 数据显示在`textBox2`。The data is displayed in `textBox2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序退出时，数据将从系统剪贴板中删除。Data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 此方法尝试将数据设置十倍中 100 毫秒的时间间隔，并引发如果所有尝试都均失败。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放到剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果非可序列化对象传递给此方法时，它将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅的序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. > > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用放置到系统剪贴板上的非持久性文本数据。The following code example uses to place nonpersistent text data onto the system Clipboard. 在中`button1_Click`方法中，从复制所选的文本`textBox1`并将其粘贴到剪贴板上。In the `button1_Click` method, the selected text is copied from `textBox1` and pasted on the Clipboard. 在中`button2_Click`方法，信息是从剪贴板检索并显示在`textBox2`。In the `button2_Click` method, the information is retrieved from the Clipboard and displayed in `textBox2`. 此代码假定`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. span.span: Clears the Clipboard and then places data on it and specifies whether the data should remain after the application exits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`copy`参数是`false`，将从系统剪贴板中应用程序退出时删除数据。If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. 此方法尝试将数据设置十倍中 100 毫秒的时间间隔，并引发如果所有尝试都均失败。This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an if all attempts are unsuccessful. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放到剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果非可序列化对象传递给此方法时，它将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅的序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. > > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下面的方法是运行应用程序中。The following method is run in an application. 它将在系统剪贴板上的文本框中选定的文本数据的持久性副本。It places a persistent copy of the selected text data in the text box on the system Clipboard. 此代码假定`button1`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button1`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在不同应用程序中，以下方法从系统剪贴板中检索文本并粘贴到文本`textBox2`。In a different application, the following method retrieves the text from the system Clipboard and pastes the text into `textBox2`. 此代码假定`button2`和`textBox2`已创建并已放置在窗体上。This code assumes `button2` and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Clipboard.SetDataObject1 Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果剪贴板正忙于处理另一个线程或应用程序，可以偶尔也会失败将数据添加到剪贴板。Adding data to the Clipboard can occasionally fail if the Clipboard is busy with another thread or application. 此方法可用于解决此问题在环境中大量使用剪贴板。This method is useful to work around this issue in environments with heavy Clipboard use. 如果`copy`参数是`false`，将从系统剪贴板中应用程序退出时删除数据。If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits. > [!NOTE] > 对象必须可序列化，才能将其放到剪贴板上。An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 如果非可序列化对象传递给此方法时，它将失败而不引发异常。If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception. 请参阅的序列化的详细信息。See for more information on serialization. > > 类仅可在线程设置为单线程单元 (STA) 模式。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用此类，请确保你`Main`方法将标有属性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute.
